text.jpText:
こらぁー！　始業時間ギリギリですよ！
遅刻は不良の始まり！　気を付けましょう！
text.enText:
Hold it right theeeere―! You're just barely 
in time for the start of school! 
Being tardy is the predecessor to 
delinquency! Do take care!

text.jpText:
もー。そう毎日プリプリしないしない！
ほら、いいんちょ肌荒れちゃってるよ？
text.enText:
Jeeez. You can't be in a huff like that every 
day, you know! 
Look, Prez, your skin is rough.

text.jpText:
え！？　肌荒れ！？！？
そ、そんな……。
text.enText:
Eh!? Rough skin!?!? 
Th, that can't be…

text.jpText:
不摂生は不良の始まり！
私、このままでは不良に……！？
text.enText:
Neglecting one's health is the predecessor 
to delinquency! 
At this rate, am I going to become a 
delinquent…!?

text.jpText:
え！　じゃあ、あたし完璧じゃん！
スキンケアちゃんとしてるし♪
text.enText:
Seriously? Then, that makes me perfect, 
don't you think! 
I always take great care of my skin♪

text.jpText:
なんと！？　ということは、
不良なのは……この私の……方……！？
text.enText:
What's this!? So, that means that, 
the delinquent… is……me!?

text.jpText:
えーっと……よくわかんないけど、
元気だしなって！　ドンマイドンマイ！
text.enText:
Uuumm… I don't totally get what you're 
saying, but I'm sure it's fine! Don't worry 
about it!

text.jpText:
肌荒れにショックを受ける
サクラバクシンオーなのであった……。
text.enText:
Sakura Bakushin O went through a crisis 
due to her rough skin…
